page.title: 06EVENTS
page.content: reopens at 1.30. The horse section includes many different breeds,the Welsh Cob,Welsh Mountain Ponys,Palominos,Hunters,Hacks and late in the afternoon there are trotting races and pony competitions. Most of the entries in the cattle sections are in the Welsh Black cattle section but there are classes for Charolais,Beef and Dairy Cattle. Poultry and goat classes have been introduced in recent years.Later,in the afternoon,at 2.00 pm the dog show commences and the shearing competition which always attracts much attention. The main tent is a major centre of attraction and last year there were over 1,500 entries in the tent.These included Vegetables,Fruit,Flowers, Floral Art,Cookery,Preserves,Wine, Honey,Dairy produce,Handycrafts, Woodwork and sections for children.
